DataElement.preferredName: Diagnosis Date Days From Anchor Date Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The number of calendar days from the data set base date to the date on which a participant's disease was diagnosed.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Diagnosis Date Days From Anchor Date
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation._The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen._The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day._Used to indicate a specified place or time as a starting point; used to indicate a source, cause, agent, or instrument._The base date from which all other dates within a cohort or data set are derived.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Any specific activity undertaken during the course of a clinical study or research protocol.
